citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20-12:00PM on
20-JANUARY-2022. Licensee was reached by phone and stated that he was out of state and other personnel would not
be available to accompany the inspector until 4PM.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20-12:00PM on 
20-JANUARY-2022. Licensee was reached by phone and stated that he was out of state and other personnel would not 
be available to accompany the inspector until 4PM. 
 
 
 
End Section
